attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the law so that council tax raising authorities are legally barred from investing council taxpayer contributions in anything other than NSandI schemes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This ensures that the money stays on shore, is guaranteed at 100% and CANNOT be lost at the whims of foreign governments.  Additionally, local council authorities will be able to save absolute fortunes because they will no longer need to pay for the advice given by dubious financial advisers who cannot be called upon to replace the money when it is lost as a direct result of the advice they gave.
